price: 162. They will abide therein (under the curse in Hell), their punishment will neither be lightened, nor will they be reprieved.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
